ABOUT.TITLE: About me
ABOUT.INTRO: Hello, I'm Robby. IT is a great source of inspiration for me, as I enjoy constantly learning new things and staying up to date with technology. This exciting field has always fascinated me. It's simply fun to solve problems, code, or develop innovative solutions. The mix of creativity and logic excites me every day anew!
ABOUT.LOCATION: I currently live in Eilenburg. I'm very open to remote work (home office).
ABOUT.LEARNING: I love new technologies and constantly learn - through practice, projects, and further education.
ABOUT.APPROACH: My approach: break down problems analytically, solve them creatively - always with a focus on elegant, efficient results. Perseverance and teamwork help me learn from every challenge.

SKILLS.TITLE: Skill Set
SKILLS.DESCRIPTION: I develop modern web applications with HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript/TypeScript and frameworks such as Angular. Clean code, performance and UX are important to me. As web development is changing rapidly, I am constantly learning - whether new tools, libraries or best practices. Flexibility and adaptability are a matter of course for me.
SKILLS.CONTACT_ME: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.
SKILLS.LEARNING_INTEREST: I have a special interest in learning

PROJECTS.TITLE: Featured Projects
PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION: Discover a selection of my work - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.

JOIN.TITLE: Join
JOIN.DESCRIPTION: Web-based Kanban app for task management: Users can create, organise and track tasks in interactive lists - ideal for individuals or teams.

SHARKIE.TITLE: Sharkie
SHARKIE.DESCRIPTION: Sharkie is a 2D game developed using HTML, JavaScript, and CSS. The game features an exciting underwater adventure where players control a shark navigating through various obstacles and challenges.

DABUBBLE.TITLE: DA Bubble
DABUBBLE.DESCRIPTION: This App is a Slack Clone App. It revolutionizes team communication and collaboration with its intuitive interface, real-time messaging, and robust channel organization.

HEADLINE_SECTION: What my colleagues say about me

TESTIMONIALS.ARNESTO: Robby is a good team colleague to me. He is very organized and has always contributed to maintaining a good atmosphere in the team. It was definitely a positive experience to implement a project with him.
TESTIMONIALS.ALDIN: Working with Robby has always been very pleasant. He not only brings technical expertise, but also impresses with his calm and solution-oriented manner – a real asset for any team. I especially appreciate his reliability: When Robby takes on something, you can 100% rely on it being done on time and with high quality.
TESTIMONIALS.PETER: Working with Robby was not only extremely effective but also consistently characterized by trust and clarity. As a true team player, he convinces with his reliability, structured work approach, and sense of common goals. I was particularly impressed by how he maintains an overview even in challenging situations and motivatingly accompanies the team.

CONTACT.PROBLEM_TO_SOLVE: Do you have a problem to solve?
CONTACT.EXPERTISE_TEXT: Whether it's project management, digitalization, or process optimization – with me by your side, it'll be strategic, creative, and above all, effective. I bring not only expertise but also fresh ideas to your projects.
CONTACT.PRIVACY_AGREEMENT_SECOND_TEXT: and agree to the processing of my data as described.
CONTACT.ERROR_EMAIL_INVALID: Please enter a valid email address.

PRIVACY_POLICY.TITLE: Privacy Policy
PRIVACY_POLICY.RESPONSIBLE_DESC: The controller within the meaning of data protection laws, in particular the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), is:
PRIVACY_POLICY.CONTACT_INFO:
Name: Robby Runge
Address: Weinbergstraße 53, 04838 Eilenburg
Email: robbyrunge@yahoo.com
Phone: +49-1624215278
PRIVACY_POLICY.YOUR_RIGHTS: Your Rights as a Data Subject
PRIVACY_POLICY.RIGHTS_DESC: Using the contact details provided above, you can exercise the following rights under the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) at any time:
PRIVACY_POLICY.RIGHT_INFO: Request information about your data stored with us and their processing (Article 15 GDPR),
PRIVACY_POLICY.RIGHT_CORRECTION: Request correction of incorrect personal data (Article 16 GDPR),
PRIVACY_POLICY.RIGHT_DELETION: Request deletion of your data stored with us (Article 17 GDPR),
PRIVACY_POLICY.RIGHT_RESTRICTION: Request restriction of data processing if we may not yet delete your data due to legal obligations (Article 18 GDPR),
PRIVACY_POLICY.RIGHT_OBJECTION: Object to the processing of your data by us (Article 21 GDPR) and
PRIVACY_POLICY.RIGHT_PORTABILITY: Request data portability if you have consented to data processing or have concluded a contract with us (Article 20 GDPR).
PRIVACY_POLICY.CONSENT_WITHDRAWAL: If you have given us consent, you can withdraw it at any time with effect for the future.
PRIVACY_POLICY.COMPLAINT: You can also submit a complaint to a supervisory authority at any time, such as the competent supervisory authority in the federal state where you reside or the authority responsible for us as the controller.
PRIVACY_POLICY.AUTHORITIES_LIST: A list of supervisory authorities (for the non-public sector) with addresses can be found at: https://www.bfdi.bund.de/DE/Infothek/Anschriften_Links/anschriften_links-node.html.
PRIVACY_POLICY.WEBSITE_INFORMATION: Collection of General Information When You Visit Our Website
PRIVACY_POLICY.PROCESSING_DESC: When you access our website, i.e., when you do not register or otherwise submit information, information of a general nature is automatically collected. This information (server log files) includes the type of web browser, the operating system used, the domain name of your Internet service provider, your IP address, and similar information.
PRIVACY_POLICY.PROCESSING_PURPOSES: This data is processed particularly for the following purposes:
PRIVACY_POLICY.DATA_USE_NOTICE: We do not use your data to draw conclusions about you personally. However, we reserve the right to check the server log files retrospectively if there are concrete indications of illegal use.
PRIVACY_POLICY.LEGAL_BASIS_DESC: Processing is carried out in accordance with Art. 6 Para. 1 lit. f GDPR based on our legitimate interest in improving the stability and functionality of our website, as well as ensuring system security and detecting misuse.
PRIVACY_POLICY.RECIPIENT_DESC: Recipients of the data may include technical service providers who act as processors for the operation and maintenance of our website.
PRIVACY_POLICY.STORAGE_DURATION_DESC: Data in server log files that allows identification of individuals is stored for a maximum of 14 days, unless a security-relevant event occurs (e.g., a DDoS attack).
PRIVACY_POLICY.STORAGE_DURATION_EVENT: In the event of such an incident, server log files are stored until the security-relevant event has been eliminated and fully resolved.
PRIVACY_POLICY.PROVISION_REQUIRED_DESC: The provision of the aforementioned personal data is neither legally nor contractually required. However, without the IP address, the service and functionality of our website cannot be guaranteed. Additionally, individual services may be unavailable or restricted.
PRIVACY_POLICY.OBJECTION_DESC: Please refer to the information about your right to object according to Art. 21 GDPR below.
PRIVACY_POLICY.CONTACT_FORM_DESC: A contact form is available on our website, which can be used for electronic contact. If a user takes advantage of this option, the data entered in the input mask will be transmitted to us and stored.
PRIVACY_POLICY.CONTACT_EMAIL_DESC: Contact can be made via the provided email addresses. In this case, the user's personal data transmitted with the email will be stored. This includes the date and time of the email, email address, IP addresses, and information about the servers involved in email communication.
PRIVACY_POLICY.CONTACT_PHONE_DESC: You can contact us via the provided telephone numbers. In this case, we collect log data including your telephone number and the duration of the call.
PRIVACY_POLICY.CONTACT_DATA_PURPOSE: Regardless of the chosen communication method, we collect the content of your inquiry. Your data is stored for the purpose of individual communication with you.
PRIVACY_POLICY.CONTACT_LEGAL_BASIS_DESC: Data processing is carried out on the basis of a legitimate interest (Art. 6 Para. 1 lit. f GDPR).
PRIVACY_POLICY.CONTACT_LEGITIMATE_INTEREST: Our legitimate interest in processing your data is to enable straightforward contact.
PRIVACY_POLICY.CONTACT_PRECONTRACTUAL: If you contact us to request a quote, the data processing is carried out for the implementation of pre-contractual measures (Art. 6 Para. 1 lit. b GDPR).
PRIVACY_POLICY.CONTACT_RECIPIENT_DESC: Recipients of the data may include technical service providers who act as processors for the operation and maintenance of our website.
PRIVACY_POLICY.CONTACT_STORAGE_DESC: Data will be deleted no later than 14 days after processing your contact request.
PRIVACY_POLICY.CONTACT_STORAGE_CONTRACT: If a contractual relationship is established, we are subject to statutory retention periods. These are generally 6 or 10 years for reasons of proper accounting and tax requirements.
PRIVACY_POLICY.CONTACT_PROVISION_DESC: The provision of your personal data is voluntary. However, we can only process your request if you provide us with the necessary data and the reason for your inquiry.
PRIVACY_POLICY.CONTACT_OBJECTION_DESC: Please refer to the information about your right to object according to Art. 21 GDPR below.
PRIVACY_POLICY.OBJECTION_INFO: Information on Your Right to Object Under Art. 21 GDPR
PRIVACY_POLICY.INDIVIDUAL_OBJECTION_DESC: You have the right to object, on grounds relating to your particular situation, at any time to processing of personal data concerning you which is based on Art. 6 Para. 1 lit. f GDPR (data processing based on a balancing of interests); this also applies to profiling based on this provision within the meaning of Art. 4 No. 4 GDPR.
PRIVACY_POLICY.OBJECTION_CONSEQUENCE: If you object, we will no longer process your personal data unless we can demonstrate compelling legitimate grounds for processing which override your interests, rights and freedoms, or processing serves the establishment, exercise or defense of legal claims.
PRIVACY_POLICY.OBJECTION_CONTACT:
Name: Robby Runge
Address: Weinbergstraße 53, 04838 Eilenburg
Email: robbyrunge@yahoo.com
Phone: +49-1624215278
PRIVACY_POLICY.POLICY_CHANGES_DESC: We reserve the right to adapt this privacy policy to ensure it always complies with current legal requirements or to implement changes to our services in the privacy policy, e.g., when introducing new services. The new privacy policy will then apply to your next visit.
PRIVACY_POLICY.QUESTIONS_DESC: If you have questions about data protection, please send us an email to the controller mentioned above.
PRIVACY_POLICY.COPYRIGHT_NOTICE: This privacy policy was created with the help of activeMind AG - the experts for external data protection officers (Version #2024-10-25).

LEGAL.TITLE: Information according to § 5 DDG
LEGAL.DISCLAIMER:
Disclaimer:

Liability for content

The contents of our pages were created with great care. However, we cannot guarantee that the content is accurate, complete, or up-to-date. As a service provider, we are responsible for our own content on these pages in accordance with § 7 paragraph 1 of the DDG. According to §§ 8 to 10 of the DDG, however, we are not obligated to monitor transmitted or stored third-party information or to investigate circumstances that indicate illegal activity. Obligations to remove or block the use of information in accordance with general laws remain unaffected. However, liability in this respect is only possible from the time of knowledge of a specific legal violation. Upon becoming aware of corresponding legal violations, we will remove this content immediately.
LEGAL.LIABILITY:
Liability for links

Our offer contains links to external websites of third parties, the content of which we have no influence on. Therefore, we cannot assume any liability for this external content. The respective provider or operator of the pages is always responsible for the content of the linked pages. The linked pages were checked for possible legal violations at the time of linking. Illegal content was not recognizable at the time of linking. However, a permanent control of the content of the linked pages is not reasonable without concrete evidence of a violation of the law. Upon becoming aware of legal violations, we will remove such links immediately.
LEGAL.COPYRIGHT:
Copyright

The content and works created by the site operators on these pages are subject to German copyright law. The reproduction, editing, distribution and any kind of use outside the limits of copyright law require the written consent of the respective author or creator. Downloads and copies of this site are only permitted for private, non-commercial use. Insofar as the content on this site was not created by the operator, the copyrights of third parties are respected. In particular, third-party content is marked as such. Should you nevertheless become aware of a copyright infringement, please inform us accordingly. Upon becoming aware of legal violations, we will remove such content immediately.
LEGAL.PRIVACY:
Data protection

The use of our website is generally possible without providing personal data. As far as personal data (for example name, address or email addresses) is collected on our pages, this is always done, as far as possible, on a voluntary basis. This data will not be passed on to third parties without your explicit consent.
We point out that data transmission on the Internet (e.g. when communicating by email) may have security gaps. A complete protection of data against access by third parties is not possible.
LEGAL.FROM: Imprint from WebsiteWissen.com, the guide for WordPress websites, WordPress hosting and website costs based on a template from the law firm Hasselbach Rechtsanwälte.
